Conan O'Brien returns to The Tonight Sho.content: Well-known comedian and former host of The Tonight Show, Conon O'Brien, is back on TV.His return to the Tonight Show was long anticipated.Needless to say, his return on the show which made him a household name, sparked excitement among fans.During his interview with current host Jimmy Fallon, O'Brien engaged in lighthearted banter, joking about his towering height and reminiscing about his brief stint as the Tonight Show host.He had been fired from the show in 2010.

Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner's daughter.content: While speaking at the service, they introduced themselves as, "Hello, my name is Fin Affleck.Ben and Jennifer Garner have three kids together - Violet Anne Affleck, 19, Fin, and Samuel Garner Affleck, 12.At Garner's father's memorial service, they introduced themselves as Fin.Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner's daughter, Seraphina Rose has come out as a trans person.In 2022, Lopez introduced daughter Emme at a public event with they/them pronouns.

National Siblings Day 2024: Bollywood st.content: From Varun Dhawan to Taapsee Pannu to Shilpa Shetty, several stars shared adorable photos and videos of their siblings and celebrated love."Meanwhile, Aparshakti Khurrana shared a hilarious video of his brother Ayushmann Khurrana and him dancing to a hit Punjabi song as their wives cheered on and Ayushmann's kids looked shocked.Varun Dhawan took to Instagram to share heartwarming photos with his elder brother - filmmaker Rohit Dhawan.He captioned the post as, "I would be nowhere in life without my elder brother.The first person who believed in me was my brother.

Bridget Jones is back: Renee Zellweger t.content: The two are set to return in a fourth film and we can’t wait to see their magic on the screen one more time.The new film is titled Bridget Jones: Mad About The Boy.A third film came in 2016 and saw Firth's Darcy competing with billionaire US love guru Jack Qwant, played by Patrick Dempsey, for Bridget's attention.Notably, Emma Thompson, who starred in the third film as Bridget's obstetrician will also return.In the Bridget Jones: Mad About The Boy book, Bridget is a widow in her 50s with two children after Mark's death some years earlier.

Richa Chadha and Ali Fazal’s Girls Will.content: Richa Chadha and Ali Fazal's much-acclaimed production feature Girls Will Be Girls has been officially selected for screening at this year's TIFF Next Wave Film Festival.We are immensely grateful for this opportunity and excited to share 'Girls Will Be Girls' with the diverse and passionate audience at TIFF Next Wave."Ali Fazal echoed her sentiments, stating, "Participating in TIFF Next Wave is a dream come true for any filmmaker.In a statement, Richa Chadha commented, "Being selected for TIFF Next Wave is a huge honour for us.'Girls Will Be Girls' is a project that is very close to our hearts, and to witness its journey from conception to being screened at TIFF is truly overwhelming.”

Patrick Swayze’s widow Lisa Niem says th.content: There are some pretty rabid Patrick fans out there who think I’m evil and just don’t like me because I was married to him,” she said.Late actor Patrick Swayze's widow Lisa Niemi has opened up about her decision to remarry after Swayze's death and find love again after his death.”On finding love again after Swayze's death Lisa added, "I didn't realise just how lonely I was until much, much later.Go ahead, tell me just because I lost my husband that I don’t love him anymore.Three years after his death, Lisa met her now-husband Albert DePrisco, who was himself recovering from a “heartbreaking” divorce.

Gwen Stefani reveals rumours about her d.content: The singer admitted to having these feelings of insecurity while creating her duet with the country music star, "Purple Irises."It’s an insecurity we both have," Shelton added.

Joker 2 trailer: A romance for the books.content: The first film came five years ago as the Todd Phillips directorial told the origin story of Joker – a struggling stand-up comedian and part-time clown named Arthur Fleck.It starts with Joker being locked up at the end of the first film.Giving us a peek into their romance, Gaga and Phoenix get together on the screen for the first time to play the world-famous lovers.Expect the unexpected as Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga get together in Joker 2 to tell the famous love story of Joker and Harley Quinn, which has been told many times before in various films and shows.It doesn’t veer too far from the first film.

Jon Snow ‘Game of Thrones’ spinoff not h.content: Kit Harington who played the fan-favourite character Jon Snow in Game of Thrones recently revealed that makers have shelved the idea of a Jon Snow spinoff show.In Game of Thrones, Kit’s character Jon Snow was exiled from Westeros.He said that the spinoff centred around Jon Snow is “off the table” since they “couldn’t find the right story to tell”.If you were among those who were eagerly waiting for a spinoff show on the life story of Game of Thrones character Jon Snow, we have a sad update for you.It was reported in June 2022 that Kit will return to his iconic Game of Thrones role.

Watch viral video: Janhvi Kapoor walks b.content: This visit came a month after Janhvi paid obeisance at the Tirupati Temple with her boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya and best friend Orry.On the occasion of Gudi Padwa, Janhvi Kapoor made her way to the Siddhivinayak Temple in Mumbai.The trio rang in her birthday at the temple.In the wee hours of April 9, Janhvi walked to the temple wearing a simple salwar suit.Janhvi kept the visit fuss-free and didn’t engage much with the cameras.

Srikanth trailer: Rajkummar Rao brings t.content: Sharing the trailer of the film on social media, the makers wrote, "Embark on a journey where every moment becomes extraordinary through Srikanth's vision!The trailer of the film Srikanth gives us a glimpse of what Rajkummar Rao’s Srikanth looks like.The film also features actor Sharad Kelkar, an investor in Bolla's business, and Alaya F, who is likely to be his love interest.The film will trace the journey of Srikanth who established the Bollant Industries, which gave employment opportunities to other visually impaired people.The film is directed by Tushar Hiranandani.

Heeramandi trailer out! Enter Sanjay Lee.content: The web series is set in pre-independence India and revolves around a beautiful, royal world where love, loss and liberation intertwine.Finally, Bhansali is bringing the idea to life with this web series, scheduled to premiere on May 1 on Netflix.Two songs of the series have already been unveiled by the makers.The series' cast includes Manisha Koirala, Sonakshi Sinha, Aditi Rao Hydari, Fardeen Khan, Adhyayan Suman, Richa Chadha, Sanjeeda Shaikh, Sharmin Segal, Shekhar Suman, and Taha Shah Badussha.The film starred Nana Patekar, Salman Khan, Manisha Koirala and Seema Biswas in pivotal roles.

Indian rapper MC Stan shares cryptic not.content: After winning the Bigg Boss 16 trophy, the rapper released several tracks and worked on projects other than music.Bigg Boss 16 winner and rapper MC Stan, whose real name is Altaf Shaikh, recently shocked his fans with his cryptic note which hinted at his departure from the music industry.A week later, he released the music video for his song "Numb," which has about 2 million views on YouTube.The song has 3 million views on YouTube.Last week, he collaborated with GQ India and gave a sneak peek into his jewellery collection, which included several diamond-studded chains, bracelets and rings.

The Little Mermaid star Halle Bailey sho.content: American singer, songwriter and actress Halle Bailey is leaving her fans shocked with her post-baby body!Sharing a picture of her son's hand, Bailey wrote, "Even though we’re a few days into the new year, the greatest thing that 2023 could have done for me, was bring me my son..Last week, Bailey celebrated her 24th birthday with her son and her boyfriend DDG in St.The actress announced the arrival of her son in January this year.American singer Pharrell Williams will produce the movie.

Ekta Kapoor fears how audience will reac.content: Producer Ekta Kapoor recently shared in an interview that she faced a tonnw of backlash after the release of her film Thank You For Coming and she worries how the audience will receive her next film LSD 2.Before the release of the teaser, the director shared a video online to clarify that he was going to show the truth in the film, no matter how dark.The makers of LSD 2 released the teaser of the film earlier this month.So, if you are in that fashion, then I can give you a disclaimer that you should not watch the LSD 2 teaser or trailer.So, while making LSD 2, we portrayed the same truth, an authentic picture of life that we see all around us.

Alec Baldwin was ‘unable to control his.content: In a 32-page public filing released on Monday, prosecutor Kari Morrissey alleged that the actor would shout and swear on the set, and his uncontrolled behaviour had affected safety.“To watch Mr Baldwin’s conduct on the set of Rust is to witness a man who has absolutely no control of his own emotions and absolutely no concern for how his conduct affects those around him,” Morrissey wrote.New Mexico state prosecutors intend to argue that Alec Baldwin was unable to control his emotions on the set of the film Rust.The prosecutor has alleged that Baldwin deflected responsibility after Hutchins was killed and that he had pulled the hammer but not the trigger on the reproduction Colt .The actor, who is also the producer of the film, is due to go on trial in July on a charge of involuntary manslaughter for his part in Hutchins’ death in Santa Fe.

Ranbir Kapoor's fitness routine for Rama.content: Away from the hustle and bustle of city life, Ranbir Kapoor has started his intense prep session for his forthcoming film Ramayana, in which he is set to play the lead role of Lord Ram.Reacting to the video, a fan wrote, "Hiking as a part of his training programme for the prep of Ramayana.While sharing the video on Instagram, Ranbir's personal trainer Nam wrote, "Went to the countryside for a decompression week.In the video, the actor is seen lifting weights, trekking, biking, swimming, and jogging.He will reprise his role in the sequel, Animal Park.

Maidaan Movie Review: Ajay Devgn's film.content: The film opens in 1952, when the Indian football team was brutally defeated by France at the Olympics.Rahim's team itself is not devoid of Bengali footballers.Rahim recruits talent from across the country - much to the dismay of influential sports writer Roy Choudhary (Gajraj Rao) and federation member Shubrata (Rudranil) who want to lobby for a Bengali coach and Bengali players.It had players like Chuni Goswami (Amartya Ray), PK Banerjee (Chaitanya Sharma), and Arun Ghosh - men who became stalwarts in the subsequent years in Indian football.Rahim (Ajay Devgn) has been accused of the team's dismal performance and the football federation of India is keen to replace him.

Hyderabad-origin actress Avantika Vandan.content: In 2014, Avantika won second place in Dance India Dance L'il Masters (North America Edition).I am excited about the future, and I hope to pave the way for more voices from India to be heard and celebrated on the world stage," concluded Avantika."She added, "I'm deeply grateful for the support and love I've received from audiences, both in India and internationally.
